attributes.action: Make Guy Fawkes an Official National Hero and give the country a day off on Nov 5th each year
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Make Guy Fawkes an Official National Hero and give the country a day off on Nov 5th each year to celebrate the great mans efforts at letting the government of the time know what the people thought of them.
Perhaps the people of the country can let the current government know their feelings by voting for this proposal.

reasons: Intended to be humorous, or has no point about government policy
